thread.title: Wanda Commercial to Raise Up to 12 Billion Yuan in A-Share Sale
thread.title_full: Wanda Commercial to Raise Up to 12 Billion Yuan in A-Share Sale - Bloomberg Business

author: Natasha Khan
title: Wanda Commercial to Raise Up to 12 Billion Yuan in A-Share Sale
text:
Dalian Wanda Commercial Properties Co. Ltd., the property developer controlled by billionaire Wang Jianlin, plans to raise as much as 12 billion yuan ($1.9 billion) in an offering of shares in China.
The Beijing-based company will sell as many as 300 million shares, which will be then listed in either Shanghai or Shenzhen, it said in a statement to the Hong Kong Stock Exchange Friday. The public float of Wanda Commercial, which is already listed in Hong Kong, will be around 47.3 percent following the sale, the statement said.
Proceeds will be used for property project investments in Nanjing, Chengdu and three other Chinese cities, the statement said. The offering must be approved by the China Securities Regulatory Commission, the statement said.
Wang is Asiaâ€™s richest man, according to the Bloomberg Billionaires Index.
